definitions.definition: The act of redoing, correcting, or rebuilding.
examples: They sent the assembly back to the shop for rework .

definitions.definition: Taking unsaleable food and using it in the manufacture of other food.

examples: They received the rework back from the shop.

definitions.definition: Work done to correct defects associated with a deliverable product, plus any root cause analysis effort to identify the task(s) to be re-performed.
examples: The schedule has been pushed back because of the rework .

main_definition: The act of redoing, correcting, or rebuilding.
secondary_definitions: ( in particular , food manufacturing ) Taking unsaleable food and using it in the manufacture of other food.
Work done to correct defects associated with a deliverable product, plus any root cause analysis effort to identify the task(s) to be re-performed.
